snippet: The Colts’ coaches have tried not to overload Andrew Luck, and he completed his unobtrusive arrival in the N.F.L. on Sunday with a comeback victory over the Packers.
abstract: Indianapolis Colts coaches are working to not overload rookie quarterback Andrew Luck, who led the team to an exciting comeback victory over Green Bay Packers; Luck's teammates are struck by his excellent command.
lead_paragraph: The Colts’ coaches have tried not to overload Andrew Luck, and he completed his unobtrusive arrival in the N.F.L. on Sunday with a comeback victory over the Packers.

headline.seo: Colts’ Andrew Luck Completes N.F.L. Arrival
headline.main: Luck, a Step Ahead as a Rookie, Hits Stride With Colts
headline.print_headline: Luck, a Step Ahead as a Rookie, Hits His Stride With the Colts
